modShortDescription: This mod allows advanced rotation on garage door and drawbridge.
modDescription:
This mod allows advanced rotation on garage door and [drawbridge](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-bridges/).

## Changelog

Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/tree/stable/donovan-betterbridges)**

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/issues).
